remarks: Lemma for ~ kur14 .  Closure is an idempotent operation in the set of subsets of a topology.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
kur14lem.j $e |- J e. Top $.
kur14lem.x $e |- X = U. J $.
kur14lem.k $e |- K = ( cls ` J ) $.
kur14lem.i $e |- I = ( int ` J ) $.
kur14lem.a $e |- A C_ X $.
kur14lem5 $p |- ( K ` ( K ` A ) ) = ( K ` A ) $.
